\[Y = \lim_{n \to \infty} \frac{|x^{n+1} / (n+1)!|}{|x^n / n!|} = \lim_{n \to \infty} |x| \cdot \frac{n!}{(n+1)!} = |x| \lim_{n \to \infty} \frac{n!}{(n+1)!} = |x| \lim_{n \rightarrow \infty} \frac{1}{n+1} = 0\]

\( Y = 0 \), for all real number \( x \), the series converges for all \( x \).
